Tilt effect will not be applied in the free version!
Shadow position will not be applied in the free version!
I feel like you want to rate me…
A pack is a package that contain a number of Stickers. Every Sticker must be contain within a pack.
What can i do with this app?
This app helps you create Stickers more easily and faster.
A bot is another computer program that runs on Telegram servers and you can communicate with it. You will use @Stickers bot to create your stickers on Telegram.
How can i convert my stickers to a pack in Telegram?
2.The bot will ask for commands. As every Sticker must be contained within a pack you need to create a new pack and add your sticker to it.
3. The bot will now ask you to give your new pack a name so send the name of the pack to the bot. This name can be anything.
4. As every sticker has a corresponding emoji to it you need to send an emoji before sending every sticker so send any emoji that correspond to the sticker you are going to send.
5. After sending the emoji send the sticker that you have created. Make sure that you are in \'pack creation mode\'
6. When you were done adding Stickers to the pack you will need to publish the pack. In order to publish a pack you need to send the publish command to the bot.
7.After sending the publish command you need to provide a short name for your pack. Short name will be only used in the link to your Sticker pack.
8. Hooray you published a new pack. The bot will give you a link which you can access your stickers from.
What if i wanted to add Sticker to a published pack?
What if i wanted to delete a Sticker from a published pack?
What does the pro version offer?
You will be able to tilt your texts plus moving their shadow, and you can create more than two packages whitin the app.
1.If it\'s the first time that you create a sticker pack you need to activate the @Stickers bot.
You are in pack creation mode. Tap me for more info (Read the \'How to convert my stickers to a pack in Telegram?\' section of the \'Help & FAQ\').
To convert your stickers to a pack in Telegram you go to "Pack creation mode" and use must use @stickers bot to do the conversion.
In Pack creation mode your stickers will be saves as PNG files with appropriate file size and image size.
I have explained the process Here.
Press the below button and hit start in the conversation that opens.
By hitting the below button you will be guided to @Stickers bot and pack creation command will be copied to your clipboard then paste it and send it to the bot
while you want to add new stickers to pack do step 4 and 5
Hit the bellow button and paste and send the copied command to the Bot.

*Note that the short name must not contain any spaces in it and must only have English alphabetic characters in it so for example it can\'t be \'55555\' or \'Stickergram app\' or \'@Stickergram\' and it must at least be 5 character and not in use by others (bot will tell you if the short name has been taken or not if it was taken you need to pick another name).
command to add sticker to a published pack. For example if i have a sticker pack that i published with this link:

then send an emoji and the sticker (in pack creation mode) itself afterward. Note that it after adding your sticker it might take up to an hour for your sticker to be added. if it was not added try removing and adding the pack.
and i want to add another sticker to that pack i should write this command:
command for just this propose. For example if i have a sticker that i published with this link
and i want to delete a sticker from that pack i should write this command:
then send the sticker from within the Telegram.
You can save your stickers on Telegram also. Tap me for more info.
To save your stickers on Telegram you need to create a sticker pack from them using the @stickers bot. How it\'s done is explained in the next question.
How can i save my stickers on Telegram?
These features are activated in the pro version:
* You will be able to rotate (tilt) your texts
* Move the shadow of the text
* Label will be removed from the bottom of your stickers
* You will be able to crop your images circularly
Circular crop is only available in the pro version!
* You can create more than 2 pack within the app
Failed to refresh check your connection!
Swipe down to refresh\nCheck your connection.
